full_summary:
### Tender Announcement for Medium Capacity Steam Sterilizer
#### Overview
The Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada is soliciting tenders for the supply and delivery of one (1) medium capacity steam sterilizer. The procurement methods will involve a combination of mandatory requirements and cost. 

#### Trade Agreements
This tender is subject to various free trade agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement. 

#### Tendering Procedures
This tender is reserved for suppliers already holding a Supply Arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada. To be eligible, suppliers must be pre-qualified under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI and meet the mandatory technical criteria.

#### Mandatory Technical Criteria
The supplier must meet the following mandatory technical criteria:
* Be already holding a Supply arrangement for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies from Public Works and Government Services Canada.
* Meet the mandatory technical criteria with the lowest aggregate price.

#### Conditions of Tendering
* Suppliers not pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement cannot submit a bid.
* Bids received from such suppliers will not be evaluated.
* Interested suppliers can qualify under the Supply Arrangement at any time.
* Suppliers can download the solicitation document E60PV-19EQUI/D from CanadaBuys (SAP Ariba) and submit a response according to the requirements of the Request for Supply Arrangement.

#### Contracting Entity Details
* Contractor: Agriculture Agri-Food Canada
* Contractor Address: 400-303 Main Street, Winnipeg, Manitoba R3C 3G7, Canada
* Contact Person: Camille Sobczak, Phone (204) 430-5426, Email camille.sobczak@agr.gc.ca

#### Tender Closes
The tender closing date is July 31, 2024, 18:00:00.
